title: BRIEF-India's Hindustan Unilever Sept Qtr Profit Rises
text:
BRIEF-India's Hindustan Unilever Sept Qtr Profit Rises

Stock Markets 42 minutes ago (Oct 14, 2019 16:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Hindustan Unilever Sept Qtr Profit Rises Oct 14 (Reuters) - Hindustan Unilever Ltd : * SEPT QUARTER PROFIT 18.48 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 15.25 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR * SEPT QUARTER SALE OF PRODUCTS 97.08 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 91.38 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR * CONSENSUS FORECAST FOR SEPT QUARTER NET PROFIT WAS 16.68 BILLION RUPEES * DECLARED INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 11 RUPEES PER SHARE * QTRLY DOMESTIC CONSUMER GROWTH WAS 7% WITH UNDERLYING VOLUME GROWTH AT 5% * NEAR-TERM OUTLOOK FOR DEMAND ESPECIALLY IN RURAL INDIA REMAINS CHALLENGING.

BRIEF-India's Hindustan Unilever Sept Qtr Profit Rises
description: BRIEF-India's Hindustan Unilever Sept Qtr Profit Rises
